auto-refresh-indicators.name: Auto Refresh Flanking Indicators
auto-refresh-indicators.hint: Number of seconds to auto-update all flanking indicators (set to 0 to disable). Some events may not trigger an update properly, this just does a global update to catch those cases.

debug.name: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Enable additional console outputs and visual indicators.

self-conditions-prevent-flanking.name: Account for Own Conditions
self-conditions-prevent-flanking.hint: When active, hide flanking indicators if the selected token's conditions would prevent flanking (e.g. unconscious, stunned, restrained, etc.).

others-conditions-prevent-flanking.name: Account for Others' Conditions
others-conditions-prevent-flanking.hint: When active, hide flanking indicators if the ally's conditions would prevent flanking (e.g. unconscious, stunned, restrained, etc.).
